1.title: Toast
1.plot: Our heroes have to help this poor unfortunate victim escape from her abusive Vamp husband! They will work day and night. They will use any magic, spells or bullets they can! They will stop at nothing!! They will... man, that's exhausting... or is it?

2.title: Nerd Alley
2.plot: Corey and Regency are walking (don't forget Corey's tracking crystal is gone) and surprise surprise Regency won't shut it. Corey needs to be at his full power and most intimidating to enter the Vampire Club.

3.title: Transpo
3.plot: The crew have to transport a magical beast to the drop off zone. Each must take a turn sitting with the monster and suffer, sin or succeed.

4.title: Undead
4.plot: The Undead are coming (and no they're not zombies) and the gang can't get away. Why can't Corey just make them go poof? Are they doomed?

imdb.plot outline: Wicca Please is the code name for a Spiritual Detective Agency based in Los Angeles that protect the world from mischievous mayhem and malevolent mojo. These hired magik-guns, vigilantes or heroes, work for the CIA, FBI, LAPD, rich folks, and everyday people who need help. This webseries follows their hilarious exploits as they: destroy a succubus, interrogate a vamp, transport a satyr, and battle the undead. With huge funny bones and mega-power at their fingertips, these four do-gooders laugh in the face of death, inappropriately jest at the apocalypse, and snark and the un-snarkbale. The team: Corey the powerful long lifed witch, Regency his tech savvy nerd assistant, Det. Demilla a tough as nails cop leading a "special considerations" unit, and Madame I Ogli a supernatural psychic drag queen.
